title: TradingView Signal Extractor with Gmail, Google Sheets & Telegram Notifications
author: Dhrumil Patel
readme:
Stay ahead in your **trading game** with this powerful **n8n automation** workflow. Designed for real-time efficiency, this setup continuously **scans your Gmail inbox** for trading alerts from **TradingView** and ensures **you never miss a signal.**

Every minute, this workflow will:

ğŸ“© **Check Gmail** for new messages using a trigger.  
ğŸ” **Identify** emails coming specifically from TradingView.  
ğŸ“Š **Extract** key trading signals like **BUY** or **SELL** along with the company name.  
ğŸ•’ **Capture** the exact date and time of the alert.  
ğŸ“„ **Log** all extracted signals neatly into a **Google Sheet** for easy tracking and analysis.  
ğŸ“² **Instantly notify you on Telegram** with a custom message so you can act fast.

Perfect for **traders** who want an **automated assistant** to handle **alerts, record them for analysis,** and provide timely updates â€” **all without lifting a finger.**
